resources.string: Welcome to Picuntu Installer - a tool to install ubuntu linux to your RK3066 based Android TV Box (e.g. MK802-III, UG802, MK808, etc.).\n\nThis tool is complete free and open sourced. It has absolutely NO warranty.
NOT implemented yet - From files on external SD card
From files on my local server (ftp, http, extract on the fly)
NOT implemented yet - From files on Internet server (download to internal SD card)
NOT implemented yet - Install to the kernel partition of your TV Box (Your Android system will be destroyed. Only for advanced users.)
Install to the recovery partition of your TV Box (you still have your Adroid system and when booting it first boots to Android. Recommended for newbie.)
Select where to install Picuntu rootfs
NOT implemented yet - Install to internal SD card for rootfs (your Android will be overwritten! Only for advanced users.)
Install to external SD card (if source is from external SD card, the same card will be erased)

A large installation file will be downloaded to your internal SD card and then extracted to your targeted rootfs partition. If downloading failed your installation fails and it has to download the whole file again. We strongly recommand you download the file to your local server.
